ivardefs.name: account_
ivardefs.desc: The set of accounts that may be used for billing for this Encounter.

ivardefs.name: appointment_
ivardefs.desc: The appointment that scheduled this encounter.

ivardefs.name: basedOn_
ivardefs.desc: The request this encounter satisfies (e.g. incoming referral or procedure request).

ivardefs.name: class
ivardefs.desc: Concepts representing classification of patient encounter such as ambulatory (outpatient), inpatient, emergency, home health or others due to local variations.

ivardefs.name: classHistory_
ivardefs.desc: The class history permits the tracking of the encounters transitions without needing to go  through the resource history.  This would be used for a case where an admission starts of as an emergency encounter, then transitions into an inpatient scenario. D

ivardefs.name: diagnosis_
ivardefs.desc: The list of diagnosis relevant to this encounter.

ivardefs.name: episodeOfCare_
ivardefs.desc: Where a specific encounter should be classified as a part of a specific episode(s) of care this field should be used. This association can facilitate grouping of related encounters together for a specific purpose, such as government reporting, issue track

ivardefs.name: hospitalization
ivardefs.desc: Details about the admission to a healthcare service.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Identifier(s) by which this encounter is known.

ivardefs.name: length
ivardefs.desc: Quantity of time the encounter lasted. This excludes the time during leaves of absence.

ivardefs.name: location_
ivardefs.desc: List of locations where  the patient has been during this encounter.

ivardefs.name: participant_
ivardefs.desc: The list of people responsible for providing the service.

ivardefs.name: partOf
ivardefs.desc: Another Encounter of which this encounter is a part of (administratively or in time).

ivardefs.name: period
ivardefs.desc: The start and end time of the encounter.

ivardefs.name: priority
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the urgency of the encounter.

ivardefs.name: reasonCode_
ivardefs.desc: Reason the encounter takes place, expressed as a code. For admissions, this can be used for a coded admission diagnosis.

ivardefs.name: reasonReference_
ivardefs.desc: Reason the encounter takes place, expressed as a code. For admissions, this can be used for a coded admission diagnosis.

ivardefs.name: serviceProvider
ivardefs.desc: The organization that is primarily responsible for this Encounter's services. This MAY be the same as the organization on the Patient record, however it could be different, such as if the actor performing the services was from an external organization (wh

ivardefs.name: serviceType
ivardefs.desc: Broad categorization of the service that is to be provided (e.g. cardiology).

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: planned | arrived | triaged | in-progress | onleave | finished | cancelled +.

ivardefs.name: statusHistory_
ivardefs.desc: The status history permits the encounter resource to contain the status history without needing to read through the historical versions of the resource, or even have the server store them.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: The patient or group present at the encounter.

ivardefs.name: type_
ivardefs.desc: Specific type of encounter (e.g. e-mail consultation, surgical day-care, skilled nursing, rehabilitation).

properties.desc: An interaction between a patient and healthcare provider(s) for the purpose of providing healthcare service(s) or assessing the health status of a patient.
